name: Stardew Valley
description: Installs Stardew Valley and SMAPI for you.
notes: For how to find and install mods visit: https://stardewvalleywiki.com/Modding:Player_Guide/Getting_Started#Find_mods Lutris places the Mods folder somewhere else. You can find it in: stardew-valley/StardewValley/game/Mods

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
- smapi: https://github.com/Pathoschild/SMAPI/releases/download/3.4.1/SMAPI-3.4.1-installer.zip
game:
  exe: StardewValley/start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/SMAPI
    src: smapi
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/SMAPI/internal/unix-install.zip
    src: $GAMEDIR/SMAPI/internal/unix-install.dat
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley/game/
    src: $GAMEDIR/SMAPI/internal/unix-install.zip
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley/game/StardewValley-original
    src: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley/game/StardewValley
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley/game/StardewValley
    src: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley/game/StardewModdingAPI
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/StardewValley/game/StardewValley
require-binaries: mono
